Items.Title: Resolution calling upon the Governor and the New York State Legislature to fully restore State funding for the education of New York City's schoolchildren and to take such further steps as are necessary to ensure that the City of New York has the financial resources to provide each of its schoolchildren with an appropriate education.
Items.ActionName: Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
Items.MatterName: Governor and the NYS Legislature to fully restore State funding for the education of NYC's schoolchildren.
